adHeader: ~~"IT LOOKS GREAT" PAINTING. small jobs welome
adDetails: friendly painter guy with over 20 years of experience painting all kinds of SF interiors I am offering correct no nonsense paintwork that will last. I have all of the tools and drop cloths so forth needed for the job, own transportation I really do enjoy painting, making things look great.. reasonable rates contact me today Jack at show contact info thank you can give a rough estimate on phone....
